mapper.insert:
insert into organization( organizationid, phone, password, otype, registrationstatus, unifiedcode, name, idnumber, oname, province, city, district, oaddress, oemail, ointroduce, olevel, registrationtime, pictureaddress, userstatusid ) values ( #{organizationid}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{otype}, #{registrationstatus}, #{unifiedcode}, #{name}, #{idnumber}, #{oname}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{oaddress}, #{oemail}, #{ointroduce}, #{olevel}, now(),
#{pictureaddress},
'1.jpg',
4 )
mapper.select: select * from organization where phone =#{phone} and password = #{password};

select *,otype.otype as oo , registrationstatus.registrationstatus as rr, (select count(*) from omembers where omembers.organizationid = organization.organizationid and omembers.memberstatusid = 1) as count, (select sum(distribute.volunteerhours) from distribute,activity,organization where distribute.activityid = activity.activityid and activity.organizationid = organization.organizationid) as zipCode from organization left join otype on organization.otype = otype.otypeid left join registrationstatus on organization.registrationstatus = registrationstatus.registrationstatusid left join areanew on areanew.area_code = organization.district where userstatusid in (1,3) and organizationid =#{organizationid};

select *,auditstatus.status as shstatus,otype.otype as oo ,registrationstatus.registrationstatus as rr,userststus.status as usstatus,(select count(*) from omembers where omembers.organizationid = organization.organizationid and omembers.memberstatusid = 1) as count from organization left join otype on organization.otype = otype.otypeid left join registrationstatus on organization.registrationstatus = registrationstatus.registrationstatusid left join areanew on areanew.area_code = organization.district left join userststus on userststus.userstatusid = organization.userstatusid left join organizeaudit on organizeaudit.organizationid = organization.organizationid left join auditstatus on organizeaudit.auditstatusid = auditstatus.auditstatusid where organization.organizationid =#{organizationid};

select count(*) from organization left join otype on organization.otype = otype.otypeid left join registrationstatus on organization.registrationstatus = registrationstatus.registrationstatusid and userstatusid in (1,3) left join areanew on organization.district = areanew.area_code and areanew.`level` = 3
organization.userstatusid in (1,3)
and organization.otype = #{otype}
and organization.organizationid like concat('%',#{organizationid},'%')
and organization.oname like concat('%',#{oname},'%')
